casebody.data:
BIO-MEDICAL APPLICATIONS OF NORTH CAROLINA, INC. d/b/a BMA Rocky Mount, Petitioner,
v.
NORTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES, DIVISION OF HEALTH SERVICE REGULATION, Certificate of Need Section, Respondent,
and
Total Renal Care, Inc. d/b/a Nash County Dialysis, Respondent-Intervenor. No. COA15-815. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. June 7, 2016.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
